regen.absent_element: constraint that modes cannot run simultaneously
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one operational mode is active at any time during the Operations State.

regen.absent_element: absence of restriction on simultaneous operation of three modes
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one mode is active at any time to prevent simultaneous operation of normal, training, and maintenance modes.

regen.absent_element: ensuring that modes cannot run simultaneously
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one mode is active at any given time in the Operations State, preventing simultaneous operation of normal, training, and maintenance modes.

label: The Operations State modes shall not exist concurrently.
absence: action of prohibiting multiple modes from running simultaneously
